attributes.action: Sack the morons who have been running British banks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the British government is now the majority shareholder in several financial institutions, it must now exercise its responsibilities and sack, shame, and, if appropriate, imprison the morons who have helped to cause the current financial crisis.  In addition, those who have been given honours, such as Sir Fred Goodwin, should be stripped of all such honours.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
